import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import "./styling/CartExcursionsCSS.css" const CartExcursions = ({ booking, excursionList, bookingIndex, excursionIndex }) => { return (

{excursionList[excursionIndex].title}

Booking Date:

Booking Date: {booking[bookingIndex].date}

Number of Participants: {booking[bookingIndex].numParticipants}

Cost: ${booking[bookingIndex].cost}.00

) } export default CartExcursions
